name: 書報討論（一）
comment: 大學部已有相似課程，且需要碩士程度背景知識
restrict: ◎限本系(含雙主修)修習   允許重複修 ◎課程不開放上修
description: The course is to train graduated students how to make an oral presentation for their own experimental results. The student can obtain the following training.
goals: How to make a nice presentation using powerpoint file.
How to organize the data and make an organized presentation.
How to summarize all chemical experimental results and make a conclusion.
syllabus:
This course is aimed to train the students with the following research abilities.

1\. How to make a nice presentation using powerpoint file.

2\. How to organize the data and make an organized presentation.

3\. How to summarize all chemical experimental results and make a conclusion.
